tests.name: Performance thuemorse (< 20k cycles)
tests.run: cat output_submit.txt | grep -a -A6 thuemorse | grep -a cycle | tr -dc '0-9' | xargs expr 20000 \>=

tests.name: Performance reverse
tests.run: cat output_submit.txt | grep -a -A6 reverse | grep -a cycle | tr -dc '0-9' | xargs expr 16000 \>=
